评论概述: It will break, but worth putting back together.
评论详情: I purchased my FIRST one in 2019. It soon made its way up to my top 5 out of my collection of over 800 necklaces. It’s unique and has people turning their heads or stopping you constantly to talk about it. I ordered one in rose gold. When building my salon’s clientele. I would wear this necklace with a few others layered up my neck. I’d sit at the most posh bar in town. Within 5-10 minutes, someone would comment on my necklaces and unique style. The conversation lead to “what do you do for a living?” I own the salon right across the street. Boom new client. As I’d be having this conversation and making an appointment, other people would hear and I’d have my staff and my books full for a week. Now the unfortunate. My original became tarnished and broke. I ordered a new one and it was not the same it looked cheap and was already broken. I waited and ordered another. A jump ring wasn’t tight and it broke while wearing. Grabbed two sets of tweezers and put it back together. This is honestly something everyone needs in their accessory collection. My go to, perfect necklace.
Don’t waste your cash. Jewelry is smaller is person and not nearly as majestic and classy. Returned 👎🏿
Just upgrades everything... soo many compliments too!
Its a beautiful piece however it arrived broken
Arrived in pieces. I'm not even sure if the pieces I got were the same necklace. I sent it back. No matter how I arranged the pieces, they were not even slightly holding a resemblance the photo.
Such a fun necklace!  Well worth the money!

I got this as a birthday present for my wife, who has severe dementia. opened it, put it on with help, and wore it proudly. very gaudy!

I received this necklace last night.  It was so pretty that I couldn’t wait until the next morning to wear it.  Already had a blouse to go with it.  This necklace has been added to my many signature jewelry pieces.
Show stopping statement necklace, bright shiny gold

The jewelry has a beautiful color and design but I spent all day chasing after pieces of my necklace falling off with with every step, bend, handshake, wave I made at my grandfather’s funeral. It was quite embarrassing. I was so frustrated that I didn’t even bother to return was was left of the necklace.  Instead I threw it away just to be done with it. Based on the look, it would have been a nice piece of jewelry to have. Although it was cheap, I’ve still had better quality than this.

The necklace's coins are smaller than I had expected, but that’s not really a problem. But the set was supposed to include a pair of earrings, this only had one earring. Im not returning this product because of a missing earring. Just bummed about it.
The earings faded really bad within 2 weeks of first receiving this item.
